articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 1501
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 1501
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected KPA Unit 1501 on Sunday. 
					He was greatly satisfied with the big successes made by the unit in the efforts to implement the on-the-spot instructions of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					He watched latest combat and technical equipment contrived and manufactured by the unit by its own efforts. 
					
					Being briefed on the performance of the equipment and their use, he was greatly pleased that the unit manufactured latest equipment badly needed for combat preparations by pooling wisdom and enthusiasm. 
					
					After receiving an explanation about the equipment from the commander of the unit, Kim Jong Un examined them for a long while, saying with a broad smile that they look nice and they are successful products, a result of profound inquiry. 
					
					He noted the latest equipment were manufactured in such a way to be convenient for using during battles and they looked efficient as they are fully ready to go into action and make a charge towards enemy positions, hitting targets, he said.
					
					He said what pleased him most was that the latest combat and technical equipment developed by the unit ensured very high mobility in combat circumstances and they became intellectual and lighter. 
					
					He expressed satisfaction over the fact that different devices that help combat equipment fully display their efficiency in difficult circumstances were manufactured and introduced. 
					
					He praised the officers of the unit for their enterprising work style of upholding the party's idea of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology in practice. 
					
					While learning in detail about the performance of the equipment after putting them into operation in the drill ground, he indicated superb and preeminent operational and tactical plans to wipe out the enemies at a lightning speed by use of those equipment in actual battles. 
					
					Watching playthings for parks made by soldiers of the unit, he highly praised them for doing good things for children. 
					
					He repeatedly praised the service personnel of the unit for having performed their duties in a responsible manner by sharply watching the moves of the enemies for aggression. He expressed expectation and belief that they would creditably perform their missions and roles as a stand-bearer and shock brigade in upholding the Songun politics of the party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Work in Different Fields of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Work in Different Fields of KPA
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the work in different fields of the KPA on Sunday. 
					He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Kyong Ok and Ryom Chol Song. 
					
					First he looked at musical instruments manufactured by the KPA. 
					
					Seeing accordions, guitars, janggus, drums, pianos, etc., he let artistes to play them in order to examine their quality and heard their opinions. 
					
					He stressed the need for the KPA to produce more quality musical instruments and send them to soldiers so that they may always spend their worthwhile days in the army full of militant optimism and joy. 
					
					Then he watched historic relics, mementoes and models to be displayed in the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum. 
					
					He said that photos of President Kim Il Sung during the Fatherland Liberation War were restored well. 
					
					Watching historic relics and materials one by one including autograph letters of the President, Kim Jong Un underlined the need to ascertain them well and intensify their discovery on the principle of historicism. 
					
					He looked at the samples of overcoats for the children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School. 
					
					He asked the children in new overcoats which one they would like and if they would like better those having fur attached to the lapel of overcoats. 
					
					When he heard with laughter the children replying they liked overcoats with turndown collars, he underscored the need to make overcoats with turndown collars with fur as desired by them before giving a task to revise the dress code. 
					
					He said that there is nothing to spare for the children of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, reliable heirs to the Juche revolutionary cause and backbones to steadfastly succeed to the revolution, and give them the best things in the world. 
					
					Then he guided the rehearsal of "We Will Achieve a Final Victory with the Arms of Paektusan" by the Song and Dance Ensemble of the KPA. 
					
					Put on the stage were mixed choruses "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colours of the Supreme Commander" and "Might of Korea", dance "Our Arms" and accordion and tap dance "The Naval Port in the Evening" and mixed chorus "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives". 
					
					After watching the rehearsal, he gave important instructions which would serve as guidelines to be held fast to by the song and dance ensemble for the creation of art works and their representation. 
					
					Saying that the WPK has great expectation towards the KPA Song and Dance Ensemble, he expressed the belief that the officials, creators and artistes of the ensemble would pool their efforts and conduct dynamic creative and performing activities to powerfully arouse the service personnel and people to carry out the Songun revolutionary cause of the party.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Restaurant Boat on Stocks
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Restaurant Boat on Stocks
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited restaurant boat Taedonggang being laid down by the KPA on Sunday.
					The boat is 68.98 meters in length, 26 meters in width and 820 tons in displacement. The two floor boat has several dinning and banquet halls, etc. capable of accommodating 300 persons at one time. 
					
					Going round the exterior and interior of the boat, Kim Jong Un was greatly satisfied to learn that KPA service personnel are working hard to complete the building of the state-of-the-art restaurant boat in a brief span of time, true to the party's policy of love for the people.
					
					Feasting his eyes on the deck and handrails around it, he asked in detail whether guests would not have any inconvenience in enjoying scenery from the deck.
					
					He asked what kind of materials were used to build the deck and underlined the need to do it well so that sanitary conditions may be fully provided  as the boat will operate as a restaurant.
					
					Going round dinning rooms, he said as the quality of structure depends on what finishing building materials are used, the boat can be successfully built only when good materials are used.
					
					Asking where furniture for the boat were made, he said the boat should be fitted out with high-quality furniture not only good in use but attractive.
					
					He underscored the need to pay great attention to air-conditioning.
					
					He said when completed, the boat would draw many visitors, underscoring the need to make good arrangements for its successful operation from now.
					
					It was the lifetime desire of leader Kim Jong Il to let people visit a modern restaurant boat on the Taedong River, pride of Pyongyang, he noted, adding the appearance of the boat cruising on the river to serve visitors would make Pyongyang more beautiful and spectacular.
					
					He set forth an important task to complete the building of the boat by April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, without fail.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Reviles S. Korea for Taking Lead in Passage of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Resolution
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Reviles S. Korea for Taking Lead in Passage of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights Resolution"
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued the following statement Sunday:
					The south Korean puppet group is stepping up human rights racket against the DPRK in alignment with the U.S.
					
					Its despicable behavior at a session of the UN Human Rights Council on March 21 for the passage of a "resolution on human rights" against the DPRK shocked all people.
					
					The puppet group took even human scum to the Council, soliciting it to take part in the racket, saying that "resolution on human rights in the north should not just end in a dead document", "steps should be taken to take the north's human rights issue to the International Criminal Court for prosecution" and "a committee of inquiry should be set up".
					
					They even slandered the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, when talking about "investigation into human rights situation", a hideous provocation.
					
					The CPRK, together with all fellow countrymen vehemently denounces with great indignation the puppet group's bid for the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" as a serious provocation and an unpardonable confrontation racket against the DPRK. 
					
					The UN Human Rights Council has long been reduced to a marionette plotting schemes for the U.S. which has been engrossed in interfering in the internal affairs of other countries and committing politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					The U.S. and the puppet group now move to make an armed intervention in the DPRK over its human rights issue, not content with their moves for a nuclear war against it.
					
					Human rights precisely mean state right.
					
					In the DPRK, a socialist country centering on the popular masses, there does not exist human rights abuses and they can not exist.
					
					It is exactly south Korea which is plagued with most serious human rights problems. 
					
					After reducing south Korea into its colony, the U.S., together with the puppet group, turned it into a theatre for free-for-all under fascist dictatorship and a veritable hell of democracy and human rights. They are not entitled to talk about "human rights issue" in the DPRK.
					
					The UN should first call to account the serious human rights abuses in south Korea, and the U.S. and the puppet group who made south Korea a barren land of human rights.
					
					However, the U.S. and the puppet group have stepped up smear campaign against the human rights in the DPRK, a desperate effort to evade a shameful defeat in the nuclear standoff with the DPRK and invent a pretext for invasion and pressure.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are hardly repressing towering resentment at the adoption of anti-DPRK "human rights resolution", a product of nefarious political plot and an extension of hostile policy.
					
					They are hardening their will to mercilessly punish the enemies while taking particularly serious note of the campaign that has been kept up even after the emergence of a new regime in south Korea.
					
					They are keeping close tabs on the U.S. and its allies and will certainly force them to pay for their smear human rights campaign against the DPRK. 
					
					The U.S. and the puppet group should clearly understand that hurting the DPRK over its human rights is a challenge to its social system and dignity, and its army and people will never tolerate such moves.
					
					We will certainly settle accounts with those who infringe even a bit on the dignity of our supreme leadership and the socialist system which we value dearer than our own lives.
					
					We will mercilessly sweep away the group of worst hooligans including those of the "Saenuri Party" which took the lead in fabricating the UN "resolution on human rights".

articles.title: S. Korean Intelligence Service's Political Intervention under Fire: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
S. Korean Intelligence Service's Political Intervention under Fire: CPRK Secretariat
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released its information bulletin No. 1025 Sunday which said as follows:
					The puppet Intelligence Service (IS)'s political intervention has been recently disclosed in south Korea, touching off great uproar.
					
					According to an opposition party lawmaker, at the time of "presidential election" campaign last year, the group of the IS put under political surveillance the organizations and figures who opposed or accused traitor Lee Myung Bak of promoting the four large river projects and pushing forward the conclusion of the "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S. IS put pressure on them from every angle while branding progressive forces as "leftist forces following the north".
					
					It has been exposed that Won Se Hun and other bosses of the IS were directly involved in the case in which a female IS staff built up the public opinion in favor of the presidential candidate from the "Saenuri Party", sparking off a furor.
					
					In this regard, south Korean opposition parties and organizations of different social standings are strongly calling for a wide and package investigation into them, denouncing the case as a blatant challenge to democratization.
					
					Upset by this, the group of the IS claimed it conducted "just activities as an intelligence organ". It went the lengths of taking issue with the DPRK, blustering that it was aimed to "prevent the north and forces following it from interfering in the pending issues of the state administration".
					
					This is shameless sophism to evade accusations at home and abroad of their criminal acts and divert elsewhere people's mindset and thus maintain the fascist dictatorial rule at any cost. It is also a mockery of south Koreans and an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					The IS is the general headquarters of the fascist dictatorial rule and a stronghold of plot-breeding and confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					It is due to the IS that the democratic right, freedom and other rights of south Korean people are being ruthlessly trampled down and pro-reunification patriots and organizations harshly suppressed.
					
					It is the IS which is terming south Koreans and progressive forces opposing the pro-U.S. fascist rule of the group of traitors and its anti-reunification moves for confrontation "forces following the north", persecuting and brutally punishing them. It is none other than the IS which is getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK human rights campaign and on the farce of spreading leaflets and alluring and abducting DPRK citizens. The IS is the chief architect which fabricated such heinous case as "bringing down statues", hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					During the period when Won Se Hun took the post of the director of the IS, the subversive activities and sabotage against the DPRK such as spying case have reached an extreme phase.
					
					The above-said case of political intervention brought into bolder relief the true colors of the IS as a den of political intrigues and politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					The IS ill-famed for all evils should be disbanded at once and Won Se Hun, mastermind of intrigues, be tried together with traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					The south Korean people should wipe out the IS, a tool of the fascist rule and citadel of confrontation with fellow countrymen, and wage a more dynamic struggle to realize democratization of south Korean society.

articles.title: People Visit National Exhibition of Consumer Goods
articles.content:
People Visit National Exhibition of Consumer Goods
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- People of different social standings and officials are visiting the national exhibition of consumer goods at the Three-Revolution Exhibition. 
					On display there are lots of consumer goods produced by working people in the field of light industrial establishments in Pyongyang and local areas including the Ministry of Light Industry and the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities and units of producing daily necessities, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's strategy for people's life.
					
					Drawing the attention of the visitors were a variety of daily necessities and consumer goods presented by different units including the Unha Guidance Bureau, the Management Bureau for the Shoe-making Industry, the Management Bureau for the Textile Industry and the Pyongyang Foodstuff Complex.
					
					Popular among the visitors were vinalon products, tetron and rayon fabrics, velvets, sports shoes, sportswear, foodstuffs, cosmetics and household utensils. 
					
					Watching seasonal clothes, clothes for children, shoes and various kinds of confectionary and drinks, the visitors deeply realized once again the validity and vitality of the party's policy on developing the light industry.
					
					Those goods produced by local industry factories with locally available raw and other materials gave the visitors deep impressions.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Provocative Anti-DPRK Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Provocative Anti-DPRK Nuclear War Drills
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Preemptive nuclear strike drills targeting the DPRK are being staged in the sky, land and seas of south Korea.
					The U.S. imperialists are wholly to blame for threatening global peace and security as they are staging dangerous saber-rattling in south Korea, the world's biggest hotspot and a nuclear arsenal with huge stockpiles of nuclear weapons and facilities.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					The U.S. authorities now seek to cover up the provocative and aggressive nature of the military drills, describing them as "annual ones" and "defensive ones" but they can convince no one, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are a nuclear test war for invading the north as they have been systematically intensified with the potentiality of a nuclear war.
					
					Through them the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have examined and rounded off prompt deployment of aggression forces on the Korean Peninsula and combined operation posture, getting them versed in the capability of preemptive nuclear attack on strategic depth and major targets of the DPRK.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. inveigled the forces of its satellite states including Britain and Australia into the drills.
					
					After shifting the strategic emphasis for world domination to the Asia-Pacific, the U.S. regards it as its first target to put the whole Korean Peninsula under its control for the purpose of securing a bridgehead for advancing to Eurasian continent. It also seeks to find the way out of domestic economic crisis in igniting the second Korean war. This is its goal for aggression.
					
					The world clearly sees who is the provoker of a war on the Korean Peninsula and harasser of its peace.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Bluff
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean FM's Anti-DPRK Bluff
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, at a meeting of "the special committee for security strategy to cope with the north's nuclear weapons" sponsored by the "Saenuri Party" groundlessly slandered the DPRK, saying that "the north keeps increasing the awareness of crisis".
					He revealed his sinister intention to persistently stand against the DPRK, bluffing that "south Korea is on a high alert to counter possible provocation by the north" and "this is a strong counteraction against wrong deeds" and calling for "quenching provocation will". He went the lengths of letting loose a spate of rhetoric that "they will open to dialogue, if the north scraps the nuclear weapons and makes a correct option".
					
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a bylined commentary in this regard;
					
					His rhetoric is sophism to brand the DPRK as "provocateur" and step up the racket for confrontation while distorting the essence of prevailing tension which is blamed on south Korea.
					
					The U.S. and the puppet forces are chiefly to blame for an extreme danger of war mounting on the Korean Peninsula as they gratuitously questioned the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and underground nuclear test for self-defense and moved to tighten "sanctions" against it and waged war drills against it.
					
					Yun should clearly know who his rival is and behave with discretion, if he is the minister of Foreign Affairs. 
					
					The DPRK can not exist even a moment without the most advantageous socialist system and independent dignity in today's world where the imperialist aggression forces have become evermore undisguised in their brigandish arbitrariness. The DPRK, therefore, has undergone all difficulties under the uplifted banner of Songun to have access to powerful nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					The DPRK will not abandon the road of its option in fear of the enemies' pressure. This is hardly imaginable.
					
					Explicitly speaking, no one can deprive the DPRK of its nuclear deterrent which will become stronger and last forever.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Its Sycophancy toward U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Its Sycophancy toward U.S.
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are standing against the fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces for aggression, a major reason of tensions escalating between the north and the south and the danger of a nuclear war increasing on the Korean Peninsula.
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					
					It is their sordid scenario to realize their ambition for "unification of systems" at any cost by dampening the Korean nation's will for independent reunification with their desperate racket for confrontation with the DPRK and intensifying war exercises against it in league with foreign forces, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The south Korean conservative group regards sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with fellow countrymen as a means that keep it alive. Mounting tension is an inevitable product. The puppet forces, blindly kowtowing to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, are terming everything it does "provocation" while stepping up confrontation racket against it.
					
					It is none other than the puppet forces which took the lead in prodding the UN Security Council into cooking up a "resolution on sanctions" with an aim to stifle the DPRK economically. It is also the south Korean forces which staged north-targeted preemptive nuclear attack drills together with the U.S. while crying out for "coping with provocation" from the north and making "strong warning."
					
					Such treachery of the puppet forces are as foolish an act as doing harm to themselves.
					
					The south Korean ruling quarters' confrontation racket against the DPRK can never be justified as it violates the dignity and interests of the nation and increases the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					The DPRK will never show mercy to the traitors who think of only provoking a war in collusion with outsiders in disregard of reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation Racket
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns S. Korean Authorities' Confrontation Racket
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet navy set March 26 as "day of punishment", three years after the Cheonan warship sinking case. It hung such provocative slogans as "Let's hold off enemy's provocation! Let us defend our sea!", instilling consciousness of confrontation with fellow countrymen into its soldiers. It now speaks loudly of holding "a meeting to pledge maritime defence" at each unit and staging a naval mobile drill by its 2nd Fleet in the West Sea on March 26, in particular.
					Minju Joson Sunday in a bylined commentary says that the puppet forces' confrontation racket against the DPRK is the product of their crafty ploy to cover up the truth behind the Cheonan case and shift the blame onto the DPRK.
					
					As already disclosed, the case is the hideous anti-DPRK smear campaign fabricated by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in league with its American master, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The Lee regime met stern punishment of the public for its crimes of confrontation with compatriots.
					
					Nevertheless, the puppet authorities are reviving the hideous farce engineered by the Lee regime. After the emergence of the new regime, large-scale nuclear war exercises against the DPRK are being staged in south Korea. The situation reached such phase where U.S. nuclear submarines and B-52 are involved in nuclear bombing drills in south Korea.
					
					The puppet forces will be held fully accountable for the extreme situation on the Korean Peninsula to be entailed by their "punishment" racket over the warship case.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Build Military Airfield on Paekryong Island
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Build Military Airfield on Paekryong Island
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military warmongers plan to build a military airfield on Paekryong Island, flashpoint in the West Sea of Korea, according to south Korean Yonhap News on March 22.
					They envision building an airfield for take off and landing of helicopters with various missions including AH-1S in Ryonhwa-ri, Paekryong Island, while calling for beefing up forces on the five islands in the West Sea of Korea.
					
					The residents of the islands are strongly protesting against the construction.
					
					They said that the authorities move to deprive them of their living lots and paddy and non-paddy fields for the construction of the airfield, declaring they would stage actions against it including rallies.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Accuse Director of Puppet Intelligence Service of Abusing Power
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Accuse Director of Puppet Intelligence Service of Abusing Power
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Citizens Solidarity for Genuine Democracy on March 21 accused the director of the Intelligence Service (IS) of abusing power at the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office.
					Shortly ago, a document was made public by a lawmaker from the Unified Democratic Party which contained instructions given by the director to his staff.
					
					The document is reported to contain the contents on coping with the public opinion over the "forces following the north", conducting massive propaganda campaign for the improvement project of four large rivers, intensifying the anti-DPRK psychological warfare and holding in check some organizations' activities of criticizing the "government" during the "presidential" election campaign last year.
					
					The organizations said that all these were aimed to intensify the anti-DPRK psychological warfare and build up the public opinion favorable for the "government" and the ruling party.
					
					It is obliviously abuse of power that they cracked down on the activities of legitimate organizations and exercised their influence even to the right to discipline on government employees, the organizations held.
					
					They urged the prosecution authorities to severely punish those who had been involved and eradicate the IS's political intervention.
					
					The representative of the Unified Progressive Party on March 19 charged the director of the IS with posting on website an article which called for enacting a "law more effective than the Security Law" as for the candidates from opposition parties in a bid to label them "forces following the north" at the "presidential election" campaign. The representative sued those who were behind it to the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office for libel.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses Disclosed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The Citizen's Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea made public a commentary to disclose human rights abuses in south Korea.
					Freedom is ruthlessly violated in south Korea as evidenced by the fact that participants of rallies and demonstrations are detained and prosecuted, the commentary said, adding:
					
					Despite the recommendations of the international community, the "Security Law" still remains in force and human rights are violated on the strength of the evil law.
					
					The commentary urged the "government" to show its active efforts for the improvement of human rights.

articles.title: Organizations of Koreas in U.S. Stage Actions against War
articles.content:
Organizations of Koreas in U.S. Stage Actions against War
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Members of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and the International Action Centre held a meeting in Manhattan, New York on March 19 in protest against the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers' joint military exercises against the DPRK.
					At the meeting speakers condemned the war drills now under way across south Korea.
					
					They said that peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula should be achieved through dialogue at an early date.
					
					Then, they staged a demonstration march.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Indonesia for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on Mar. 20.
					Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The chairman of the preparatory committee at an inaugural ceremony said that Kim Il Sung was a great master of ideology and theory who clearly indicated the road to be followed by not only the Korean people but also the world progressives by founding the Juche idea. He praised Kim Il Sung as the greatest man who made signal contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events between March 25 and April 10.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Slovenia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Slovenia
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on March 18. 
					The chairman of the Slovenia-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events for widely introducing the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung in the period between March 18 and April 17.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Egypt
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Egypt
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Egypt for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 19.
					According to the decision made at a meeting of the Supreme Committee of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, member and deputy chairperson in charge of foreign affairs of the Supreme Committee, was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including a seminar on the works of Kim Il Sung, photo exhibition and film show during the celebration period from April 1 to 16.

articles.title: Special Meeting on Situation of Korean Peninsula Held in UK
articles.content:
Special Meeting on Situation of Korean Peninsula Held in UK
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A special meeting related to the situation on the Korean Peninsula was held in London on March 16.
					Present there were figures of political parties and organizations including the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and masses.
					
					Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, imparted the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army issued on March 5 to the participants and made a report at the meeting.
					
					He said that the moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK have reached a dangerous phase.
					
					He went on:
					
					From March 11 the Korean Armistice Agreement was totally nullified. So the Korean Peninsula is in state of a war in actuality.
					
					The reason for it is that the U.S. imperialists together with their followers including south Korean puppet forces kicked off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises to make a preemptive strike at the DPRK, instigated the UN Security Council to adopt a new "resolution on sanctions" against it and continuously violated the AA.
					
					The U.S. imperialists have further intensified the psychological warfare against the DPRK.
					
					We call on the progressive forces of the world to give wide publicity and disseminate the advantages of Korean-style socialism and positively support the DPRK.
					
					We will actively support the Korean people who turned out in the all-out action against the U.S.
					
					The report was followed by speeches.
					
					Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, noted that defending the DPRK is a very important issue at present, adding that the world progressive political parties and peoples would always stand on the side of the Korean people.
					
					A resolution adopted at the meeting demanded the stop to the joint military exercises for aggression and the withdrawal of the unjust UNSC's "resolution".

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Weapon Is to Guard against U.S. Invasion: Russian Paper
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Weapon Is to Guard against U.S. Invasion: Russian Paper
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- A Russian paper on March 8 carried an article titled "A bomb for Juche".
					The article noted that the U.S. and its allies are stepping up the moves to invade the DPRK citing the latter's satellite launch and nuclear test.
					
					The article said:
					
					It is impossible to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					The militant spirit and mental and moral traits of the Korean People's Army are on a remarkably high level.
					
					The DPRK is producing all sorts of weapons by itself and bulking up its military capabilities for national defence.
					
					Important is that the possession of nuclear weapons substantially turned the DPRK into an impregnable country no outside forces dare provoke.
					
					It is also impossible to frighten the DPRK with sanctions. It is a truth proved by history that the DPRK gets stronger in its stance despite the constant stranglehold against it.
					
					The DPRK is rejecting the unjust double-standards applied against it.
					
					Why is only the DPRK banned from launching a satellite and having access to nuclear weapons? It is a vivid example of double-standards.
					
					Sanctions against it only backfired.
					
					Sanctions will not work on the DPRK.
					
					The more sanctions are imposed, the stronger the DPRK becomes, instead of getting weaker.
					
					The U.S. has no stumbling block checking it from providing the DPRK with the guarantee on non-aggression.
					
					The nuclear weapons of the DPRK are to defend the country from the invasion by the U.S.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Test Demonstrates Will to Defend Sovereignty: Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Test Demonstrates Will to Defend Sovereignty: Foreign Media
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Media of Russia, Ukraine and a regional organization carried articles supporting the DPRK's third underground nuclear test on March 13 and 15.
					The website of the Anti-"Globalization" Movement of Russia said in an article titled "Thunder of DPRK":
					
					The U.S. maneuvered the UN Security Council to pass a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					This is an encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK had neither need nor plan to conduct the nuclear test.
					
					Its original aim was to focus efforts on economic construction and improvement of people's living standard.
					
					But it was compelled to conduct the nuclear test as the U.S. wantonly encroached upon its right to satellite launch and escalated hostile acts against it.
					
					The recent nuclear test of the DPRK was an eruption of surging resentment at the U.S. hostility and, at the same time, a demonstration of the transparent will to defend its sovereignty to the last and its tremendous capability.
					
					Other website and internet magazines of Russia, an Ukrainian internet paper and the website of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions carried articles proving the validity of the DPRK's measure of bolstering nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Hostile Moves of U.S. under Fire by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Hostile Moves of U.S. under Fire by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Russia and Democratic Congo denounced the U.S. and its allies for getting undisguised in their hostile moves against the DPRK.
					The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK in its statement on March 9 noted the U.S. is scheming to provoke a war on the Korean Peninsula as it did 60 years ago. 
					
					It went on:
					
					Huge aggression forces were activated to join the joint military drills now under way by the U.S. in south Korea. It indicates the U.S. fear of the powerful military capabilities of the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. imperialists have always invaded other countries' territory by egging their stooges on to ignite wars against those countries.
					
					Should a war break out in Korea, the world progressive humankind will stand on the side of the Korean people.
					
					We remind all the anti-DPRK hostile forces of the fact that the Korean people don't want a war but never have a fear of it.
					
					The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo in its statement on March 13 positively supported the principled stands clarified by the DPRK for safeguarding the country's sovereignty.
					
					The statement said:
					
					We condemn the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises aimed to stifle the DPRK militarily.
					
					We don't recognize the "resolution on sanctions" adopted by the UN Security Council as it wantonly violated the DPRK's inalienable sovereignty.
					
					We vehemently denounce the U.S. for pinpointing the DPRK as a target of preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					Opposing the double-standards of the UNSC, we demand the U.S. and other forces kowtowing to it immediately halt hostile acts against the DPRK.

articles.title: Pyongyang Folklore Park Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Pyongyang Folklore Park Introduced by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign media introduced the Pyongyang Folklore Park from March 14 to 18.
					The bulletin of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association carried an article titled "Time-honored history, brilliant culture and peculiar folk custom". The park has been built in the area of Mt. Taesong of the DPRK in a peculiar way, it said, referring in detail to the composition of the park.
					
					The park fully shows how much the Korean people value their long history and brilliant culture, it noted.
					
					The German Internet website Korean Information carried an article and photos introducing the park under the title "Pyongyang Folklore Park".
					
					The article said: The park vividly portrays the five thousand year-long history, culture and tradition of Korea. Models of big edifices including the Arch of Triumph, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower and the Tower of the Juche Idea help know well about the history of modern Korea.
					
					The website of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and a Russian internet newspaper and internet magazines carried articles and photos introducing the park.

articles.title: Korean People's Efforts for Sovereignty and Peace Supported by Jamaican Governor-General
articles.content:
Korean People's Efforts for Sovereignty and Peace Supported by Jamaican Governor-General
Pyongyang, March 24 (KCNA) -- The governor-general of Jamaica expressed his understanding of the efforts of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty and peace and hoped that the DPRK would work hard to ensure global peace and stability.
					The governor-general said this on March 19 when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to his country Jon Yong Jin.
					
					Jamaica and the DPRK have developed good relations on the principle of mutual respect since the establishment of the bilateral diplomatic relations, he said.
					
					He sincerely hoped that the danger of a nuclear war would be removed from the Korean Peninsula at an early date and all issues be settled peacefully through dialogue.
					
					He also wished the dear respected Kim Jong Un good health and great success in his noble work for leading the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona el batallon 2 adscrito a la unidad 1973 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona el batallon 2 adscrito a la unidad 1973 del EPC
Pyongyang, 24 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea,  inspecciono el dia 23 el batallon 2 adscrito a la unidad 1973 del EPC galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Tras dar como recuerdo a la primera compania de citado batallon los binoculos, fusil automatico y ametralladora, el Comandante Supremo tomo foto junto con los oficiales y los soldados.
					
					Escucho las explicaciones sobre el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion, edificado para transmitir para siempre el 8 de febrero de 1974 y el 9 de abril de 2000 cuando los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il visitaron el batallon respectivamente y recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Subrayo que seran eternas las hazanas inmortales de los Generalisimos con el estandarte de la unidad.
					
					En la sala de leccion militar, el Mariscal se informo de la mision de combate del batallon y el estado de su movilizacion al combate y de ejercicios.
					
					Tras prestar gran atencion al proyecto de combate, el Comandante Supremo dijo que cuando todos los combatientes conocen como a la palma de la mano los objetos militares de los enemigos y los organos titeres de dominacion reaccionaria a ser atacados por ellos mismos y sus caracteristicas, en tiempo de emergencia, puedan embestir como relampago el baluarte enemigo y aniquilarlo de un tiron.
					
					Anadio que dado que los combatientes luchen en la zona enemiga donde no hay flancos ni retaguardia, debe desarrollar sustancialmente los ejercicios topograficos para que tengan correctas nociones sobre la topografia y prepararlos como los combatientes con infalibilidad en tiros y cuerpo robusto capaces de combatir uno contra cien enemigos.
					
					Destaco que los oficiales deben preocuparse siempre de que pueda estallar la batalla si pasa este momento, que no haya falta en los preparativos del combate y que los combatientes esten listos para cumplir satisfactoriamente con su mision en la zona enemiga y encomendo que deben organizar intensivamente los ejercicios y formar todos ellos como maestros en la guerra moderna.
					
					Recalco que el partido cree en los combatientes y que si ocurre el gran acontecimiento revolucionario para la reunificacion de la patria, ellos deben mostrar el verdadero coraje de combate del EPC y su voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos, al destruir mas que nadie el centro de los enemigos.
					
					Agrego que deben golpear reiteradamente a los enemigos para que no vuelvan en si y aniquilarlos sin piedad.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal recorrio el almacen de soya del batallon.
					
					Enseno que pensando en el Dirigente quien preguntaba sobre la cosecha de soya cada vez que visitaba la unidad, deben preparar este ano abundante cosecha de soya.
					
					A continuacion, dio vuelta por la biblioteca y la sala de leccion de la Universidad Politica O Jung Hup.
					
					En la biblioteca, apunto que deben establecer entre los uniformados el estilo revolucionario de estudio y utilizar bien los libros para que ellos lean muchos libros.
					
					Al preguntar uno tras otro sobre el contenido de la leccion y la capacidad de los profesores, instruyo hacer bien la labor docente conforme a la psicologia y la propiedad de los combatientes y dispenso gran benevolencia a las Universidades Politicas O Jung Hup de la gran unidad combinada.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion, dormitorio, cocina y otras instalaciones de cultura, educacion e intendencia de la compania heroina Kim Sun Son adscrita al batallon.
					
					En la sala de educacion, el dijo que hay que oirse siempre las voces del partido en la compania, celula y unidad principal de combate del EPC.
					
					Senalando que el dejo a los soldados a los oficiales, subrayo que esta muy contento cuando se encuentra con los oficiales que cuidan bien a los soldados a quienes cuida y ama el partido y se siente digno de la inspeccion a la unidad cuando los uniformados viven bien.
					
					El Mariscal dirigio los ejercicios de los militares del batallon.
					
					Viendo los ejercicios de los militares, se mostro muy satisfecho de que ellos se hayan preparado bien tanto en lo tecnico-militar como en lo fisico, evaluo altamente el exito de su entrenamiento y presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para fortalecer por todos los medios la combatividad.
					
					El mismo dia, el Mariscal organizo de modo inesperado y dirigio los ejercicios de tiro de pistola y fusil automatico de los comandantes del batallon.
					
					Los combatientes deben preparar en lo politico y ideologico, en lo militar y tecnico y en lo fisico y tener el arte de tiro infalible, dijo y enseno la maestria de tiro.
					
					Instruyo a los Estudios de Filmes Cientificos y Documentales Militares del EPC a fabricar videos de diversos metodos de tiro y enviarlos a todo el ejercito para que se unifique el propio metodo de tiro de combate.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyok Sik, Hwang Pyong So y Son Chol Ju.
